description:
LATEST: Course Last Updated 10th June 2016

************************************************

Do you find product creation difficult? Do you believe that you're not a creative person? Do you lack imagination?

What if you could have unlimited product ideas - so many that you wouldn't know where to choose from? What if you could decide immediately which product ideas are good and which are bad?

How profitable would this make you?

This can be the new you!

If you've ever blanked when it comes to product creation, then this course is made exactly for you!

Learn how to create 7 products in 7 days and making sure that they are winners from the start.

+++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • No workbooks, CD's or anything else is required
  • Tons of satisfied students
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

+++++++++++++++++++++++

This course teaches beginner to intermediate students the most important principles that you must apply when you are coming up with new product ideas. It will then take you a step further and show you what to do with your ideas, from choosing the ones that will be successful from the ones that won't, how to inject your personality into your course, and how to take it a step further by making sure that you add your own touch to your products.

There are a number of pitfalls that you must surely avoid if you want to become successful with product creation, and these are covered in the course as well.

When you avoid these pitfalls, you'll be well on your way to building a product that people would want to buy - simply because you are selling exactly to the people with the problem that you can solve.

The course covers the following topics:

  1. Why you should be keeping everything
  2. Why you should never dismiss ideas
  3. Product generation ideas part 1
  4. Product generation ideas part 2
  5. Getting creative
  6. Evaluating your ideas
  7. 5 important questions you have to ask yourself
  8. Love it or quit it
  9. Profitable information products
  10. Upselling and how to do it correctly
  11. Information products done right
  12. How to keep it interesting part 1
  13. Injecting your own personality
  14. And more...

The course is presented in easy to understand terminology and allows students to take their knowledge of product creation to a higher level of knowledge. The course is delivered in a number of videos to cover each of the topics mentioned above. There are also many practical tips all throughout the course which will allow you to take what you are learning in the videos and turn it into real life ideas that you can implement with your target market.

Students are encouraged to take an active role throughout the course, by jotting down notes and actively use the ideas that they get as they are watching the videos in real life.

If you believe that you are ready to take your product creation to the next level, then this is the course for you. The ideas covered in this course will ensure that you are able to communicate better, more accurately and more in line with what you are trying to sell.

Hit the "Start Learning Now" button and I'll see you on the inside!
title: No more broke - Generate ideas to create an online business
